array.name: faq_question
array.item: Who can register for different programs?
Does Al Dar offer scholarships?
Does Al Dar accept transfer students?
Does Al Dar accept visiting students?
Can I visit the college before admission?
Does Al Dar provide residence visa to the students?

array.name: faq_answer
array.item: All students who fulfill the minimum admission criteria of Al Dar are eligible for the admission and the registration for various programs available at Al Dar University College.

Yes, Al Dar offers a wide range of scholarships and discounts intended to support students in continuing their education. There are many types of scholarships/ grants (High School, sibling, government employee, international student, financial aid) available to the students.
Yes, Al Dar accepts transfer students as per the transfer policy of the Al DarUniversity College.
Yes, Al Dar accepts visiting students based on the permission granted by their university.

Yes, Al Dar gladly welcomes all the prospective students and their parents/relatives to visit the campus and have a campus tour of all the facilities provided to the students. They are also welcome to have interaction with faculties and the staff if they wish so.
Yes, Al Dar provides residence visa to all the admitted students based on the approval of visa request by the UAE Immigration Authority.
